goals.1: Fitting all belongings into the bin
goals.2: If there is a red object, don't pack it into the box
goals.3: If there is a elastic object, don't pack it into the box

rules.1: don't pick and place a box called bin
rules.2: when place a rigid objects in the bin, the soft objects must be in the bin before
rules.3: when a rigid object in the bin at the initial state, out of the rigid object and replace it into the bin
rules.4: you must push a soft object to make more space in the bin, however, if there is a fragile object on the soft object, you must not push the objectwhen push a object, neither fragile and rigid objects are permitted
